section.p: The common notion of "procedure" is broader than that specified by the HL7 Version 3 Reference Information Model (RIM). Therefore procedure templates can be represented with various RIM classes: act (e.g., dressing change), observation (e.g., EEG), procedure (e.g., splenectomy). This template represents procedures whose immediate and primary outcome (post-condition) is the alteration of the physical condition of the patient. Examples of these procedures are an appendectomy, hip replacement, and a creation of a gastrostomy.???? This template can be used with a contained Product Instance template to represent a device in or on a patient. In this case, targetSiteCode is used to record the location of the device in or on the patient's body. Equipment supplied to the patient (e.g., pumps, inhalers, wheelchairs) is represented by the Non-Medicinal Supply Activity (V2) template.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-7654, CONF:1098-10521, CONF:1098-32506 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Procedure Activity Procedure template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1098-7653)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] targetSiteCode (CONF:1098-7683), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-16082)
In the case of an implanted medical device, targetSiteCode is used to record the location of the device, in or on the patient's body.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-7661), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProcedureAct statusCode 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.22 STATIC 2014-04-23 (CONF:1098-32366)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7775, CONF:1098-7776, CONF:1098-31395)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7779, CONF:1098-7780, CONF:1098-15914)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7886, CONF:1098-7887, CONF:1098-15915)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Medication Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16:2014-06-09)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] specimen such that it (CONF:1098-7697)
This specimen is for representing specimens obtained from a procedure (CONF:1098-16842).
If you want to indicate that the Procedure and the Results are referring to the same specimen, the Procedure/specimen/specimenRole/id SHOULD be set to equal an Organizer/specimen/specimenRole/id (CONF:1098-29744)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer such that it (CONF:1098-7718)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:1098-7720)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7722, R2.0=CONF:1098-7722)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:1098-7731)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:1098-7732)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization such that it (CONF:7733, R2.0=CONF:1098-7733)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:7734, R2.0=CONF:1098-7734)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:7735, R2.0=CONF:1098-7735)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:7737, R2.0=CONF:1098-7737)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:7736, R2.0=CONF:1098-7736)

SHOULD contain [1..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-32479)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32473, CONF:1098-32474, CONF:1098-32475)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Reaction Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.9:2014-06-09)
entryRelationship with target entry Instruction2 SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:1098-7777)
@code SHOULD be selected from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:1098-19207)
@code MAY be selected from CPT-4 (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12) or ICD10 PCS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4) or CDT-2 (Code System: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.13) (CONF:1098-19207)
participant with target entry Service Delivery Location SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: HL7ParticipationType 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90 STATIC) (CONF:1098-7766)
SHALL conform to Procedure Activity Procedure template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PROC" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7652, R2.0=CONF:1098-7652)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1098-7653)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7655, R2.0=CONF:1098-7655)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:7656, R2.0=CONF:1098-7656)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-7661), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProcedureAct statusCode 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.22 STATIC 2014-04-23 (CONF:1098-32366)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:7662, R2.0=CONF:1098-7662)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Act Priority 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16866 DYNAMIC (CONF:7668, R2.0=CONF:1098-7668)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:7670, R2.0=CONF:1098-7670)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] targetSiteCode (CONF:1098-7683), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-16082)
In the case of an implanted medical device, targetSiteCode is used to record the location of the device, in or on the patient's body.

MAY contain [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:7765, CONF:15912, R2.0=CONF:1098-7765, R2.0=CONF:1098-15912)
Conforms to Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)

MAY contain [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:7751, CONF:15911, R2.0=CONF:1098-7751, R2.0=CONF:1098-15911)
Conforms to Product Instance (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.37)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:7768, R2.0=CONF:1098-7768)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8009, R2.0=CONF:1098-8009)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:7769, R2.0=CONF:1098-7769)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encounter such that it (CONF:7770, R2.0=CONF:1098-7770)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ENC" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7771, R2.0=CONF:1098-7771)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7772, R2.0=CONF:1098-7772)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:7773, R2.0=CONF:1098-7773)
MAY satisfy: Set the encounter ID to the ID of an encounter in another section to signify they are the same encounter. (CONF:16843, R2.0=CONF:1098-16843)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7775, CONF:1098-7776, CONF:1098-31395)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7779, CONF:1098-7780, CONF:1098-15914)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7886, CONF:1098-7887, CONF:1098-15915)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Medication Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16:2014-06-09)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] specimen such that it (CONF:1098-7697)
This specimen is for representing specimens obtained from a procedure (CONF:1098-16842).
If you want to indicate that the Procedure and the Results are referring to the same specimen, the Procedure/specimen/specimenRole/id SHOULD be set to equal an Organizer/specimen/specimenRole/id (CONF:1098-29744)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer such that it (CONF:1098-7718)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:1098-7720)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7722, R2.0=CONF:1098-7722)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:1098-7731)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:1098-7732)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization such that it (CONF:7733, R2.0=CONF:1098-7733)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:7734, R2.0=CONF:1098-7734)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:7735, R2.0=CONF:1098-7735)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:7737, R2.0=CONF:1098-7737)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:7736, R2.0=CONF:1098-7736)

SHOULD contain [1..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-32479)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32473, CONF:1098-32474, CONF:1098-32475)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Reaction Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.9:2014-06-09)

code in a procedure activity SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96), and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12) or ICD10 PCS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4) (CONF:19207)
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:7658, R2.0=CONF:1098-19203)
originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15908, R2.0=CONF:1098-19204)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15909, R2.0=CONF:1098-19205)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15910, R2.0=CONF:1098-19206)
methodCode SHALL NOT conflict with the method inherent in Procedure / code (CONF:7890, R2.0=CONF:1098-7890)
entryRelationship with target entry encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8009, R2.0=CONF:1098-8009)

participant with target entry Product Instance SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DEV" Device (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:7752, R2.0=CONF:1098-7752)
participant with target entry Service Delivery Location SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:7766)
entryRelationship with target entry Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:7777)
entryRelationship with target entry Instruction2 SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:1098-7777)
@code SHOULD be selected from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:1098-19207)
@code MAY be selected from CPT-4 (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12) or ICD10 PCS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4) or CDT-2 (Code System: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.13) (CONF:1098-19207)
participant with target entry Service Delivery Location SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: HL7ParticipationType 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90 STATIC) (CONF:1098-7766)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7654 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14"

Consol Procedure Activity Procedure code in a procedure activity SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96), and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12) or ICD10 PCS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4) (CONF:19207)
Consol Procedure Activity Procedure code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:7658, R2.0=CONF:1098-19203)
Consol Procedure Activity Procedure originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15908, R2.0=CONF:1098-19204)
Consol Procedure Activity Procedure reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15909, R2.0=CONF:1098-19205)

Consol Procedure Activity Procedure reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15910, R2.0=CONF:1098-19206)
Consol Procedure Activity Procedure methodCode SHALL NOT conflict with the method inherent in Procedure / code (CONF:7890, R2.0=CONF:1098-7890)
Consol Procedure Activity Procedure entryRelationship with target entry encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8009, R2.0=CONF:1098-8009)

Consol Procedure Activity Procedure participant with target entry Product Instance SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DEV" Device (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:7752, R2.0=CONF:1098-7752)

Consol Procedure Activity Procedure participant with target entry Service Delivery Location SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:7766)
Consol Procedure Activity Procedure entryRelationship with target entry Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:7777)
SHALL conform to CDA Procedure
Consol Procedure Activity Procedure SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PROC" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7652, R2.0=CONF:1098-7652)
Consol Procedure Activity Procedure SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MoodCodeEvnInt 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 STATIC 2014-09-01 (CONF:7653)
Consol Procedure Activity Procedure SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7655, R2.0=CONF:1098-7655)
Consol Procedure Activity Procedure SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:7656, R2.0=CONF:1098-7656)
Consol Procedure Activity Procedure SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProcedureActStatusCode 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.22 DYNAMIC (CONF:7661)
Consol Procedure Activity Procedure SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:7662, R2.0=CONF:1098-7662)
Consol Procedure Activity Procedure MAY contain zero or more [0..*] specimen, where its type is Procedure Specimen (CONF:7697)

Consol Procedure Activity Procedure MAY contain [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:7765, CONF:15912, R2.0=CONF:1098-7765, R2.0=CONF:1098-15912) Conforms to Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)
Consol Procedure Activity Procedure SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer, where its type is Procedure Activity Performer (CONF:7718)

Consol Procedure Activity Procedure MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:7886, CONF:7887, CONF:15915) Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP, and Conforms to Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)

Consol Procedure Activity Procedure MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:7775, CONF:7776, CONF:15913) Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ, and Conforms to Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)

Consol Procedure Activity Procedure MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:7779, CONF:7780, CONF:15914) Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON, and Conforms to Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19)

Consol Procedure Activity Procedure MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Act Priority 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16866 DYNAMIC (CONF:7668, R2.0=CONF:1098-7668)
Consol Procedure Activity Procedure MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:7670, R2.0=CONF:1098-7670)

Consol Procedure Activity Procedure SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] targetSiteCode (CONF:7683), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:16082)

Consol Procedure Activity Procedure MAY contain [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:7751, CONF:15911, R2.0=CONF:1098-7751, R2.0=CONF:1098-15911) Conforms to Product Instance (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.37)
Consol Procedure Activity Procedure MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship, where its type is Entry Relationship (CONF:7768, R2.0=CONF:1098-7768)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root=""
Consol Procedure Specimen SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] specimenRole (CONF:7704, R2.0=CONF:1098-7704)
Consol Procedure Specimen specimenRole SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:7716, R2.0=CONF:1098-7716)

Consol Procedure Specimen To indicate that the Procedure and the Results are referring to the same specimen, the Procedure/specimen/specimenRole/id SHOULD be set to equal an Organizer/specimen/ specimenRole/id. (CONF:7717)
SHALL conform to CDA Specimen
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root=""
SHALL conform to CDA Performer2
Consol Procedure Activity Performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity, where its type is Procedure Activity Assigned Entity (CONF:7720)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root=""
SHALL conform to CDA Assigned Entity
Consol Procedure Activity Assigned Entity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7722, R2.0=CONF:1098-7722)
Consol Procedure Activity Assigned Entity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:7731)
Consol Procedure Activity Assigned Entity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:7732)
Consol Procedure Activity Assigned Entity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization, where its type is Procedure Activity Represented Organization (CONF:7733, R2.0=CONF:1098-7733)
SHALL conform to CDA Organization
Consol Procedure Activity Represented Organization SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:7734, R2.0=CONF:1098-7734)
Consol Procedure Activity Represented Organization MAY contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:7735, R2.0=CONF:1098-7735)
Consol Procedure Activity Represented Organization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:7737, R2.0=CONF:1098-7737)
Consol Procedure Activity Represented Organization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:7736, R2.0=CONF:1098-7736)
SHALL conform to CDA Entry Relationship
Consol Entry Relationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8009, R2.0=CONF:1098-8009)
Consol Entry Relationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:7769, R2.0=CONF:1098-7769)
Consol Entry Relationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encounter, where its type is Procedure Activity Encounter (CONF:7770, R2.0=CONF:1098-7770)
Consol Procedure Activity Encounter MAY satisfy: Set the encounter ID to the ID of an encounter in another section to signify they are the same encounter. (CONF:16843, R2.0=CONF:1098-16843)
SHALL conform to CDA Encounter
Consol Procedure Activity Encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ENC" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7771, R2.0=CONF:1098-7771)
Consol Procedure Activity Encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7772, R2.0=CONF:1098-7772)
Consol Procedure Activity Encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:7773, R2.0=CONF:1098-7773)
